Welcome to SKIIwalker-web

Simple Kean Interactive Information - or SKIIwalker, is a mobile application used for displaying information based on the application user's current position. SKIIwalker uses GIS or geographic information systems to detect when a user enters a building and will display relevant information and events to the user through the mobile application. It is our hope that SKIIwalker will help to streamline mobile distribution of event data throughout the Kean Union campus.

This is the administrative web application for SKIIwalker where administrators can enter event details that the SKIIwalker mobile application will display to users. SKIIwalker-web is backed by a MongoDB database and was built on top of the RDash-angular dashboard boilerplate.
